briefdescription.para: Transmits message directly on the CAN bus.

parameterdescription.para: canNode on which the message shall be transmitted
ID of the message that will be transmitted
pointer to the data that shall be transmitted
Specifies the data length
Specifies the type of frame for the message that will be transmitted.
if transmission successful, otherwise E_NOT_OK

memberdef.name: CAN_Send

briefdescription.para: Add message to transmit buffer, message will be transmitted shortly after.

parameterdescription.para: canNode on which the message shall be transmitted
ID of the message that will be transmitted
pointer to a uint8_t array that contains the message that will be transmitted
length of the message that will be transmitted This parameter can be a value of CAN_identifier_type.
Specifies the type of frame for the message that will be transmitted. This parameter can be a value of CAN_remote_transmission_request
if successful, E_NOT_OK if buffer is full or error occurred

briefdescription.para: Transmits a can message from transmit buffer.

parameterdescription.para: canNode on which the message shall be transmitted
if transmission successful, otherwise E_NOT_OK

briefdescription.para: Reads a can message from RxBuffer.

parameterdescription.para: canNode on which a message has been received
message that has been received
if reception successful, if buffer empty or invalid pointer E_NOT_OK
